input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Woodblock Ten Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Short Sleeve Movement Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton Polo'
  - Name='Faherty Rugby Jersey Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Crew T-Shirt Womens'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Crew Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Crew Tee'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Air Slub Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Casual Short Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Air Slub V-Neck Cotton Blend T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Off-Duty Terry Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Rec Long-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Atlas Longsleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Luxor Jersey Tank Top'
  - Name='TreeBlend Men's Henley T-Shirt'
  - Name='Tentree Men's Cloudy Forest Ten Graphic Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='tentree Men's Fishing Sasquatch T-Shirt'
  - Name='TenTree Men's Vintage Sunset T-Shirt'
  - Name='tentree Men's Hawthorn Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Pact Women's Cool Stretch Fitted Lounge Tank'
  - Name='Pact Men's Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Long Sleeve Henley - Black - Long sleeve t-shirts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Woodblock Ten Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Made of organic cotton and a men's t-shirt, closely matching core materials and function of the reference heavyweight organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Short Sleeve Movement Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve shirt with movement focus but likely a different fabric and intended use than heavyweight tailored tee.
Polo style differs in collar and construction; also likely lighter fabric than heavyweight organic cotton tee.
A rugby jersey shirt is a tee silhouette but typically heavier and structured differently, somewhat relevant but distinct.
Crew neck cotton tee, but women's sizing and 'sunwashed' fabric differs from heavyweight tailored tee.
Crew tee similar in style but 'sunwashed' fabric indicates a lighter, possibly less durable material than heavyweight tee.
Crew tee similar in style but 'sunwashed' fabric indicates a lighter, possibly less durable material than heavyweight tee.
Similar crew neck style with pocket, but sunwashed cotton likely lighter and less tailored than heavyweight tee.
Duplicate entry; same rationale applies as above for a crew neck tee with lighter fabric.
Duplicate entry; same rationale applies as above for a crew neck tee with lighter fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s v-neck t-shirt made of pima cotton, different neckline and gender focus, plus pima cotton usually lighter.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Air Slub Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's crew neck tee with cotton blend, air slub denotes lightweight breathable fabric differing from heavyweight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Casual Short Sleeve Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual short sleeve tee similar in silhouette but likely lighter cotton or cotton blend rather than heavyweight organic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Air Slub V-Neck Cotton Blend T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different neckline (v-neck), lighter air slub cotton blend fabric, less similar construction and feel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Off-Duty Terry Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck tee with terry fabric likely heavier and casual, somewhat similar in weight but different fabric texture.
Long sleeve variant differs from short sleeve, but functionally similar organic cotton tee.
Long sleeve cotton shirt similar in material but different silhouette and intended use (long sleeve).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kotn Men's Luxor Jersey Tank Top
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tank top silhouette differs significantly from crew neck tee, less relevant despite possibly similar fabric.
Henley style has button placket and different neckline, but still a casual cotton top targeting similar customers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tentree Men's Cloudy Forest Ten Graphic Short Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve graphic tee likely made of cotton, similar in silhouette but includes graphic design element.
Casual graphic tee with short sleeve silhouette, similar function but emphasis on graphic prints.
Similar to other casual graphic short sleeve tees, similar use and silhouette but less tailored.
Likely a button-up shirt, differing in silhouette and construction from a tee.
Organic cotton crew neck tee, closely aligned in fabric and silhouette but may lack the heavyweight tailored aspect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Women's Cool Stretch Fitted Lounge Tank
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tank top silhouette and womenâ€™s lounge wear focus differ significantly from heavyweight organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Menâ€™s crew neck short sleeve tee made from organic cotton, strongly aligned in function and construction with reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Long Sleeve Henley - Black - Long sleeve t-shirts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve henley differs in naming and detail but shares organic cotton material and casual use.
